subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Apoel Nicosia extended its improbable run in the Champions League after two saves by goalkeeper Dionisios Chiotis gave it a 4-3 penalty shootout victory over Lyon.
snippet: Apoel Nicosia extended its improbable run in the Champions League after two saves by goalkeeper Dionisios Chiotis gave it a 4-3 penalty shootout victory over Lyon.
